item.title: Baldwin 出价 10 亿美元收购竞争对手 CAC 集团的保险经纪公司
item.description: 鲍德温集团周二表示，将以 10.3 亿美元的现金加股票交易收购竞争对手保险经纪公司 CAC 集团。【原文：The Baldwin Group said on Tuesday it will buy rival insurance broker CAC Group in a $1.03 billion cash-and-stock deal, adding to a string of mergers in recent years as industry consolidation accelerates.】

item.title: 微芯科技上调第三季度利润和收入预期
item.description: 芯片制造商微芯科技（Microchip Technology）周二上调了对第三季度净销售额和每股收益的预期，这主要得益于强劲的预订量，该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 2.3%。【原文：Chipmaker Microchip Technology on Tuesday raised its expectations for third-quarter net sales and earnings per share, driven by strong bookings, sending its shares up 2.3% in extended trading.】

item.title: 独家报道：联合利华支持的审计发现 Ben & Jerry's 基金会在财务控制和管理方面存在缺陷
item.description: 据联合利华旗下将于下周分拆上市的 Magnum 公司称，对 Ben & Jerry's 基金会进行的审计发现，该基金会在财务控制和管理方面存在缺陷。【原文：An audit of the Ben & Jerry's Foundation, a U.S.-based non-profit solely funded by the brand, found that it had deficiencies in financial controls and governance, according to Magnum, the Unilever unit set to be spun off next week that will own the ice-cream maker.】

item.title: 交易日：科技、美联储希望重磅来袭
item.description: 周二，全球股市上涨，在前一天的震荡后重拾升势，并受到科技和人工智能情绪持续上扬的提振，投资者还继续押注美联储将在下周降低美国利率。【原文：World stocks rose on Tuesday, regaining their poise after wobbling the previous day and lifted by an extended upswing in tech and AI sentiment as investors also continued to wager the Federal Reserve will lower U.S. interest rates next week.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 预测季度营收乐观，人工智能应用推动增长
item.description: 周二，CrowdStrike 预测第四季度营收将高于分析师预期，原因是这家网络安全公司受益于其产品套件中人工智能应用的增长。【原文：CrowdStrike forecast fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Tuesday, as the cybersecurity firm benefits from growing adoption of AI across its product suite.】

item.title: 美国电话电报公司承诺终止 DEI 计划
item.description: 美国无线运营商 AT&T 在致美国电信监管机构的一封信中表示，该公司已承诺结束多元化、公平和包容计划，此举正值该公司寻求特朗普政府批准购买无线频谱资产之际。【原文：U.S. wireless carrier AT&T said in a letter to the U.S. telecoms regulator that it had committed to ending diversity, equity and inclusion programs, a move that comes as it seeks approval from the Trump administration to buy wireless spectrum assets.】

item.title: 美国鹰服装公司上调年度销售预期
item.description: American Eagle Outfitters 周二上调了其年度可比销售额预期，看好节日期间市场对其服装和配饰的需求。【原文：American Eagle Outfitters raised its annual comparable sales forecast on Tuesday, betting on marketing-driven demand for its apparel and accessories during the holiday season.】

item.title: Marvell 拟以 32.5 亿美元收购芯片初创公司 Celestial AI，以增强网络产品组合
item.description: 芯片制造商美满电子科技公司（Marvell Technology）周二表示，将以现金加股票的方式收购半导体初创公司 Celestial AI，交易价值 32.5 亿美元。【原文：Chipmaker Marvell Technology said on Tuesday it will buy semiconductor startup Celestial AI in a cash-and-stock deal worth $3.25 billion, as it looks to upgrade its networking products amid intensifying competition from bigger rivals Broadcom and Nvidia.】

item.title: 网络安全工具需求上升，Okta 预计季度收入强劲
item.description: 网络安全公司Okta周二预测第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注于对其身份和访问管理解决方案日益增长的需求。【原文：Cybersecurity company Okta forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on growing demand for its identity and access management solutions.】

item.title: EMJ 的杰克逊旨在消除加密货币的波动性
item.description: 在比特币交易价格远低于近期高点的情况下，对冲基金经理兼激进投资者埃里克-杰克逊（Eric Jackson）打赌，投资者仍然希望接触加密货币，只是在下跌过程中痛苦会少一些。【原文：With bitcoin trading well below its recent highs, hedge fund manager and activist investor Eric Jackson is betting that investors will still want exposure to crypto — just with less pain on the way down.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请两名高级银行家拓展中型企业投资银行业务
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通周二聘请了两位新的董事总经理 R. Sean Daugherty 和 Robert Rosenfeld，以加强其北美中型企业并购团队。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday hired two new managing directors, R. Sean Daugherty and Robert Rosenfeld, to strengthen its North America mid-cap mergers and acquisitions team, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: Vultr 将投资 10 亿美元建设使用 AMD 芯片的俄亥俄州人工智能集群
item.description: 云基础设施公司 Vultr 周二表示，它将投资超过 10 亿美元，在俄亥俄州斯普林菲尔德的一个新数据中心启动一个由先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）处理器驱动的新人工智能集群。【原文：Cloud infrastructure company Vultr said on Tuesday it would invest more than $1 billion to launch a new artificial intelligence cluster powered by Advanced Micro Devices' processors at a new data center in Springfield, Ohio.】

item.title: 假日网购的强劲开端掩盖了美国消费者脆弱的迹象
item.description: 美国假日购物季以创纪录的在线销售额拉开帷幕。但经济脆弱的潜在迹象表明，消费回落可能迫在眉睫。【原文：The U.S. holiday shopping season kicked off to record online sales. But underlying signs of economic fragility signal a pullback in spending could be looming.】

item.title: Anthropic 收购开发者工具初创公司 Bun 以扩大人工智能编码规模
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 周二表示，它已经收购了帮助开发人员更有效地运行和管理代码的 Bun 公司，这家克劳德制造商希望提高其编码代理的速度和稳定性。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said on Tuesday it has acquired Bun, which helps developers run and manage codes more effectively, as the Claude maker looks to boost the speed and stability of its coding agent.】

item.title: 罗林斯称美国将于下周宣布为农民提供 "过桥付款
item.description: 美国农业部长布鲁克-罗林斯（Brooke Rollins）周二表示，特朗普政府将于下周宣布一项针对农民的 "过桥付款 "计划，旨在为农民提供短期救济，同时敲定更长期的贸易和援助计划。【原文：Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins said on Tuesday that the Trump administration will announce a “bridge payment” for farmers next week that is designed to provide short-term relief while longer trade and aid packages are finalized.】

item.title: IDC 认为 2026 年全球智能手机出货量将因内存成本上涨而下滑
item.description: 研究公司 IDC 的数据显示，由于存储芯片价格不断上涨，平均售价屡创新高，预计 2026 年全球智能手机出货量将下降 0.9%。【原文：Global smartphone shipments are expected to decline by 0.9% in 2026 as rising memory chip prices are pushing average selling prices to record highs, according to research firm IDC.】

item.title: 旧金山就超加工食品起诉卡夫和梦迪尔兹公司
item.description: 本周二，旧金山市起诉了卡夫、Mondelez、可口可乐和其他超加工食品制造商，指控他们在知情的情况下，用令人上瘾的有害产品恶心加州居民。【原文：The city of San Francisco sued Kraft , Mondelez , Coca-Cola and other makers of ultra-processed foods on Tuesday, accusing them of knowingly sickening California residents with addictive and harmful products.】

item.title: 俄罗斯外贸银行（VTB）看中美资公司，力争打造农业领域的冠军企业
item.description: 俄罗斯第二大银行 VTB 首席执行官安德烈-科斯汀（Andrei Kostin）周二表示，该公司正在洽谈收购一家大型农业生产商，这是该公司打造全国农业冠军的努力的一部分。【原文：Russia's second-largest bank VTB is in talks to buy a major agricultural producer, CEO Andrei Kostin said on Tuesday, as part of its drive to create a national champion in the sector.】

item.title: Instacart 因工人工资和小费法起诉纽约市
item.description: Instacart 周二起诉纽约市，要求阻止执行影响这家食品杂货配送公司的五项法律，包括有关应用程序员工最低工资和向客户披露小费的规定。【原文：Instacart sued New York City on Tuesday to block enforcement of five laws affecting the grocery delivery company, including rules governing minimum pay for app-based workers and disclosures to customers about tipping.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉副总统拒绝出售 Citgo 母公司
item.description: 委内瑞拉副总统兼石油部长德尔西-罗德里格斯（Delcy Rodriguez）周二表示，在美国法官上周批准出售炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 的母公司之后，委内瑞拉拒绝接受美国法律程序中的 "欺诈性 "和 "强迫性 "出售。【原文：Venezuelan Vice President and Oil Minister Delcy Rodriguez said on Tuesday the South American country rejects the 'fraudulent' and 'forced' sale of the parent company of refiner Citgo Petroleum in a legal process in the United States, after the sale was authorized by a U.S. judge last week.】

item.title: 联合国贸易机构称，全球金融体系必须进行调整以更好地服务于经济
item.description: 联合国贸易和发展会议（UN Trade and Development Agency）周二表示，如果金融体系不能适应经济发展的需要，就有可能破坏全球贸易，而发展中国家可能受害最深。【原文：The financial system risks undermining global trade if it fails to adapt to the economy's needs, with developing countries likely to suffer the most, the UN Trade and Development Agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 策略的杠杆 ETF 因加密货币低迷而遭受重创
item.description: 与比特币囤积者策略公司（Strategy）有关的杠杆式交易所交易基金（ETF）是今年加密货币市场低迷的最大受害者之一，因为比特币价格下跌打击了最大的代币企业持有者的股票。【原文：Leveraged exchange‑traded funds (ETFs) linked to bitcoin hoarder Strategy are among the biggest casualties of this year's crypto slump, as falling bitcoin price battered shares of the largest corporate holder of the token.】

item.title: 特朗普称明年初将宣布美联储新主席人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他将在明年初宣布美联储下任主席人选。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he would be announcing his selection for the next chair of the Federal Reserve early next year.】

item.title: 贡渥集团新任首席执行官在联合创始人离职后强调大宗商品交易商一切照旧
item.description: 贡渥集团（GGL.UL）新任首席执行官加里-佩德森（Gary Pedersen）周二在接受路透社采访时强调，这家总部位于瑞士的大宗商品交易商一切照旧，他上任前一天，联合创始人托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjorn Tornqvist）突然被管理层收购。【原文：Gunvor's (GGL.UL) new CEO, Gary Pedersen, stressed it was business as usual for the Swiss-based commodities trader during a Reuters interview on Tuesday, a day after he took over as part of an abrupt management buyout of co-founder Torbjorn Tornqvist.】

item.title: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构对 TikTok 和 LinkedIn 展开调查
item.description: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构周二开始对 TikTok 和 LinkedIn 进行调查，因为人们担心这两家公司的非法内容举报机制不便于使用，或者不允许人们匿名举报儿童性虐待材料。【原文：Ireland's media regulator began investigations into TikTok and LinkedIn on Tuesday over concerns that their illegal content reporting mechanisms are not easy to access or do not allow people to report child sexual abuse material anonymously.】

item.title: 消息人士称，花旗集团聘请美国银行高管推动大宗商品经纪业务
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团已聘请美国银行高管吉利安-斯奈德（Jillian Snyder）担任北美地区资本引进主管。【原文：Citigroup has hired Bank of America executive Jillian Snyder as its head of capital introductions for North America, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英伟达首席财务官称芯片制造商尚未敲定1000亿美元的OpenAI交易
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）首席财务官科莱特-克雷斯（Colette Kress）周二在亚利桑那州举行的瑞银全球技术与人工智能大会上表示，英伟达与 ChatGPT 母公司 OpenAI 达成的向这家初创公司投资高达 1000 亿美元的协议仍未最终敲定。【原文：Nvidia's agreement with ChatGPT parent OpenAI to invest up to $100 billion in the startup is still not finalized, the chipmaker's chief financial officer Colette Kress said on Tuesday at the UBS Global Technology and AI Conference in Arizona.】

item.title: 谷歌支持的 TAE Technologies 与英国核机构成立合资公司
item.description: 由 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司和雪佛龙公司支持的私营公司 TAE Technologies 周二表示，它已与英国核机构组建了一家合资企业，共同开发核聚变用中性束。【原文：TAE Technologies, a private company backed by Alphabet's Google and Chevron , said on Tuesday it had formed a joint venture with the United Kingdom's nuclear agency to develop neutral beams for nuclear fusion.】

item.title: 中国审查机构打击网上对房地产行业的 "厄运预言
item.description: 中国网络空间监管机构上海分部周二表示，在房地产长期低迷的情况下，该机构删除了数千篇 "对房地产市场进行末日预言和对住房政策进行歪曲解读 "的网络帖子。【原文：The Shanghai branch of China's cyberspace regulator said on Tuesday that it removed thousands of online posts for "doom-mongering the real estate market and distorting interpretations of housing policies", amid a prolonged property slump.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在人工智能芯片中使用英伟达技术，并推出新服务器
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的AWS云计算部门周二表示，将在其未来几代人工智能计算芯片中采用英伟达（Nvidia）的关键技术，因为该公司正在加大力度争取主要的人工智能客户使用其服务。【原文：Amazon.com's AWS cloud computing unit on Tuesday said it will adopt key Nvidia technology in future generations of its artificial intelligence computing chips as the firm ramps up efforts to get major AI customers using its services.】
